name: Shelf Life (TimothyPeck, DorianTan, WindRider97, TitusVM)
description:
Shelf Life - Always more

Consumerism plays a large part in today's society, always buying more, always using more, always more trash in the oceans.

To shed some light on the issue, we have made a runner game where you play the part of a black Friday shopper, longing for the newest and best electronics.

Disclaimer:

Some animations are broken in the web version.
